data.name: Deckbound Heroes (Open Beta)
data.detailed_description:
** This is an open beta - you can currently experience core gameplay, deck building and card levelling across 3 different maps **


You can view your cards on the genesis map when you open packs


Build decks with your cards and formulate a strategy


Give yourself the advantage by taking control of the map's outposts

Deckbound Heroes is a competitive multiplayer strategy card game. With no RNG or deck draw mechanic, the game's focus on strategy is often compared to that of chess or Go.

Deckbound Heroes is currently in open beta. The remaining features will be launched over the coming months as we lead into a full release.

You win a game of Deckbound Heroes by defeating your opponent's Hero in a best-of-three format. Decks are built to a points limit. There's no RNG and you can see your opponent's deck from the start of the game. Building powerful and flexible decks is key to success in Deckbound Heroes.

The Deckbound Game and Collection Manager features a comprehensive deck builder that allows you to filter, sort and tag your cards. Deckbound Cards are created through a process called inception. Each card is unique, but draws from a set of known abilities from a genesis block. Abilities appear at a different levels on a card and can be unlocked by gaining XP and levelling up cards. A higher level card is more flexible, but not necessarily more powerful. All of a card’s abilities are defined at inception, so you can see which abilities will become available before reaching their required level.

Each map features different mechanics and different environments. To win games, you’ll need to balance map control with attacks on your opponent.

We recently launched the first batch of incepted abilities and are currently working on trading and single player content. We'll update you here as these things become live.

data.short_description: Deckbound Heroes is a turn-based strategy game played with collectible cards. There’s no RNG or card draw and decks are built against a points limit. Play over a series of maps in a skills-first take on the CCG format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or any discrete GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
